Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its unique features and high-quality materials, it's truly a remarkable item. I believe it would greatly enhance your experience and satisfaction. Considering its exceptional value, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the premium quality and benefits it brings. I'm confident you'll find this investment worthwhile. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
